title: What if your favorite champion invaded a different game?
body:
What would they look like? What would they be capable of!? Young Pre-rework Taric...

http://i.imgur.com/GPSexvW.jpg

replies.body: NO WARWICK DON'T KILL ELMO. ALL HE WANTS TO DO IS SPELL. DEAR GOD WHY DID YOU MAKE ME THINK OF THIS. THIS IS TERRIBLE. THERE IS THE LIMBS OF THOSE SESAME STREET GUYS  EVERYWHERE. OH GOD SOMEBODY JUST LET ME BLEACH MY EYES. LET ME GO BLIND. WHY ME. WHY DID I HAVE TO WITNESS THIS
i honestly thought the OP pic was illaoi

truly outrageous truly truly truly outrageous
(i played old taric and spammed that shite the whole game
Sora from Kingdom Hearts in LoL? Shit man... that would be the best.
DJ sona running around CoD just aim botting everyone...yes please.
Red Baron {{champion:42}} in Battlefield I? I guess that'll work
